Plot: The ALIVE special tells the story of Liv, a small town dancer, who dreams of a bigger stage than the community center of Fergus, Ontario. One fateful night LIV meets her idol Multi Platinum...
Title: Alive
Writer: Dane Clark, Linsey Stewart, Randall Thorne
Actors: Mario Castillo, K.C. Collins, Danny Davalos, Shawn Desman
